short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A personal landing page to access all bookmarks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple app to keep all your bookmarks organized. The popup can save a bookmark for the web page currently open in Chrome as well as allow you to view the entire list you've created. From the big list, you can manually name, categorized, and save new bookmarks as well as delete ones you no longer need.
